title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Wangaratta
creator_credit: Roberto Salvatore, Csilla Csongvay, Shelley Matulick, ACMI Content Development and ACMI
brief_description: This program contains nine stories about residents from around the Wangaratta region in north-eastern Victoria. Covering the towns of Eldorado, King Valley, Greta, Whitfield and Whitlands, locals tell stories about their lives and their connection to the land and the community.
title_for_label: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Wangaratta

Covering the towns of Eldorado, King Valley, Greta, Whitfield and Whitlands, locals tell stories about their lives and their connection to the land and the community.
